quote_last: , Beth left the museum, hailed a taxi and, after giving the driver her address, sat in the back surrounded by boxes and unashamedly shed a tear.
title: Next in Line
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: . The seated guests were told that the ceremony would begin shortly. A little more patience was required.
title: Trouble & Triumph: A Novel of Power & Beauty
author: Tip "T.I." Harris with David Ritz
